jobInfo.postDescription:
About the Role
 As Test Develop Engineer, he/she will be responsible for the Consumer Audio related 
automation verification with the support from internal cross-function team members and external 
suppliers, working in wire/wireless and Audio connectivity area (Ethernet, WIFI, Bluetooth, 
Dolby, DTS...), ensure the Harman audio product software quality and compliance for different 
modules/products.

What You Will Do
• Familiar with the consumer audio product test (Speaker, Soundbar, Headphone,
Earphone...).
• Familiar with wire/wireless audio product test (Ethernet, Wifi, Bluetooth, audio...).
• Work with software engineering team to ensure the product compliant with regulation and 
customer reliability requirement
• Work with test automation group to develop test scripts or tools ensure the product robust 
and stability.
• Ownership, Collaboration and Results Driven are more important during the work.
What You Need
• Bachelor Degree with Computer Science or Software Engineering major minimum;
• 1-3 years hands-on experience in test development of embedded Linux system, proficient 
within one of programming Python, Java, C/C++ at least;
• Experienced usage with Bluetooth/WIFI/Ethernet/Serial product test libs;
• Familiar usage with Android and IOS system and debug tools;
• Fluent English expression in Reading/Writing.
What is Nice to Have
• Experienced with at least one of Jenkins, RobotFrameWork, Selenium/Appium, or other 
CI test framework;
• Ideally knowledge of software development processes;
jobInfo.address: 深圳哈曼科技(深圳)有限公司港口大厦20

brandComInfo.introduce: 上海微创软件股份有限公司2002年由微软与上海市政府共同创办，是微软在华投资的第一家合资公司。微创始终秉承高标准的服务品质与“成就客户”的服务理念，在全球设有20余处交付中心，分布在中国、美国、日本、澳大利亚，凭借在汽车、保险、高科技、金融、互联网等行业的深厚积累和丰富经验，与2500余家企业与政府客户达成了长期、稳定、友好的合作。
